body:
I decided to take time in nerfing and buffing some kits in Walls.

Here is the Current list of what Each kit does and What's edited!

Starter:
All Stone Tools

Barbarian:
Replaced Leather Helmet with Chain Helmet
No other Changes

Miner:
Added Chain Helmet
No other Changes

Cook:
5 Steak to 8 Steak and Spawns with Wooden Sword
No other Changes

Bunny:
16 Carrots
Feather Falling 3 Boots
Jump Boost 2

Beastmaster:
Added Sharp 1 Stone Sword
No other Changes

Snowman:
Removed This Kit

Tarzan:
Added 4 Logs
Added Knockback 2 Wooden Sword

Poseidon:
Depth Strider 2 Chain Boots
Nothing Else

Builder:
No Changes

Archer:
Added Wooden Sword + Changed Bow to Power 2

Healer:
No Changes

Lumberjack:
Added Chain Helmet
No other Changes

Smelter:
Added Furnace to Spawn Kit
No other Changes

Sonic:
No Changes

Leech:
Added Fire Aspect Wood Sword
No other Changes

Stomper: OH BOY! CAN'T WAIT TO SEE THE HATE FOR THIS GRENINJA NERF
Changed Diamond Boots to Leather Boots
Stomper now Spawns with Slowness 1 - hate me

Tank:
Now Spawns with Leather Helmet instead of Iron
No other Changes

Wither:
Removed

Ghast:
Removed

Alchemist:
Nothing Changed

Magician:
No more Enchantment Table
Now spawns with 6 Books + Anvil
No other Changes

Fireman:
Now Spawns with Diamond Axe
Nothing Changed

Guardian:
Removed Iron Chestplate
Diamond Helmet now has Prot 2

Maniac:
Spawns with Diamond Sword now

Knight:
NEW KIT
Horse Egg + Saddle






Anything you guys don't like?
Reply down below
Any Suggestions?
Reply down below!

title: ☆ Official Walls Kit Buffs + Nerfs ☆

replies.body:
*Reads stomper's changes*

Brb going to kill myself..
replies.body_tagged:
*Reads stomper's changes*

Brb going to kill myself..

replies.body:
"Magician:
No more Enchantment Table"
Any chance of re adding that? Some maps don't have enchantment tables if I recall correctly.
Other than that everything looks good. Nise job Seth!

rip stomper tho
replies.body_tagged:
"Magician:
No more Enchantment Table"
Any chance of re adding that? Some maps don't have enchantment tables if I recall correctly.
Other than that everything looks good. Nise job Seth!

rip stomper tho

replies.body:
Everything looks amazing, Stomper needed a de-buff. Slowness 3 is a lot, maybe 1 or 2? 3 is very slow, but it may work, the best way to know it to test it ;p

Magician w/o enchant table, I actually like this. The maps that don't have enchant tables are meant to not have one, a kit shouldn't change the game-play that much ;3

Everything else looks amazing! 
     Thanks Seth! :D
replies.body_tagged:
Everything looks amazing, Stomper needed a de-buff. Slowness 3 is a lot, maybe 1 or 2? 3 is very slow, but it may work, the best way to know it to test it ;p

Magician w/o enchant table, I actually like this. The maps that don't have enchant tables are meant to not have one, a kit shouldn't change the game-play that much ;3

Everything else looks amazing! 
     Thanks Seth! :D

replies.body: The original post, the only post. The others are replies. The original post for this one is the post where all the kits are listed.
replies.body_tagged: The original post, the only post. The others are replies. The original post for this one is the post where all the kits are listed.

replies.body: How about you just remove the slowness? And change the boots to leather.
replies.body_tagged: How about you just remove the slowness? And change the boots to leather.

replies.body: There is no discription of kits, only changes :/
replies.body_tagged: There is no discription of kits, only changes :/

reply_to.body: The original post, the only post. The others are replies. The original post for this one is the post where all the kits are listed.
reply_to.body_tagged: The original post, the only post. The others are replies. The original post for this one is the post where all the kits are listed.

replies.body:
Starter:
All Stone Tools
Desription: You spawn with: stone sword, stone pickaxe, stone axe, stone shovel. (maybe a stone hoe?)

Barbarian:
Replaced Leather Helmet with Chain Helmet
No other Changes
Description: Spawn with some armor (I don't know the exact armor, but it's not all that great. It's  not bad though.)

Miner:
Added Chain Helmet
No other Changes
Description: You spawn with a chain helmet, iron pickaxe, and I believe 16 torches. 

Cook:
5 Steak to 8 Steak and Spawns with Wooden Sword
No other Changes
Description: spawns with 8 steak and a wooden sword.

Bunny:
16 Carrots
Feather Falling 3 Boots
Jump Boost 2
Description: Spawns with 16 carrot, feather falling 3 boots (I don't know what kind, I haven't tested it yet.) and jump boost 3.

Beastmaster:
Added Sharp 1 Stone Sword
No other Changes
Description: Spawns with some bones and wolf eggs (Again, I don't use this, I don't know how many of things.)

Snowman:
Removed This Kit

Tarzan:
Added 4 Logs
Added Knockback 2 Wooden Sword
Description: Spawns with 8 or 16 apples, 4 logs, 16 vines. (and if I'm not wrong I think it may have jump boost 1 or 2)

Poseidon:
Depth Strider 2 Chain Boots
Nothing Else
Description: Spawns with night vision, and water breathing, depth stider 2 chain boots. (Depth Strider makes you go faster in water)

Builder:
No Changes
Description: 16 cobbles stone, and 16 logs.

Archer:
Added Wooden Sword + Changed Bow to Power 2
Description: Spawns with 32 arrows, a power 2 bow, and a wooden sword.

Healer:
No Changes
Description: Spawns with a splash healing 2 pot, and a drinkable healing 2 pot. (That may not be right, I've used it once xD)

Lumberjack:
Added Chain Helmet
No other Changes
Description: Spawns with an iron axe, and a chain helmet. 
Other: When you break logs with the iron axe, all of the logs above that log straight upwards also break.

Smelter: 
Added Furnace to Spawn Kit
No other Changes
Description: Spawn with furnace
Other: If you have an iron ore, and click a furnace with the iron ore in your hand it will instantly smelt into and iron ingot.

Sonic:
No Changes
Description: Spawns with leather boots and speed 1.

Leech:
Added Fire Aspect Wood Sword
No other Changes
Description: Spawns with a Fire Aspect wooden sword.
Other: When you kill someone you get 4 health. (I'm not sure if that's 2 hearts, or 4 hearts.)

Stomper: OH BOY! CAN'T WAIT TO SEE THE HATE FOR THIS GRENINJA NERF
Changed Diamond Boots to Leather Boots
Stomper now Spawns with Slowness 1 - hate me
Description: Spawns with leather boots, and slowness 1. 
Other: If you fall near someone, it will do damage to them. 

Tank:
Now Spawns with Leather Helmet instead of Iron
No other Changes
Description: Spawns with some armor. (Again, I don't use this kit, I don't know the exact armor. ;c)

Wither:
Removed

Ghast:
Removed

Alchemist:
Nothing Changed
Description: Spawns with a brewing stand, and some stuff used to make potions. 

Magician:
No more Enchantment Table
Now spawns with 6 Books + Anvil
No other Changes
Description: Spawns with 6 books, a anvil, and 32 EXP bottles.

Fireman:
Now Spawns with Diamond Axe
Nothing Changed
Description: Spawns with a lava bucket, a water bucket, and a diamond axe.

Guardian:
Removed Iron Chestplate
Diamond Helmet now has Prot 2
Description: Spawns with a protection 2 diamond helmet.

Maniac:
Spawns with Diamond Sword now
Description: Spawns with a diamond sword
Other: You get strength for 2-4 seconds from killing someone. (I'm not sure of the exact time.)

Knight:
NEW KIT
Horse Egg + Saddle
Description: Spawns with a horse spawn egg and a saddle.


Your welcome ;p <3

replies.body:
Added Kit Viper

This Kit makes you spawn with nothing except the powers to poison any enemies with any type of hit (bow/melee)
